item.description:
"Mile of Mills" Walking Tour
Saturday, October 9, 2010
9:00 a.m.-Noon
$15 MHA members, $20 general public (includes lunch)
Pre-registration is required

Participants will gain insight into the landscape and the industrial history of Manchester by walking the entire length of the Amoskeag Manufacturing Company Millyard (about 1 1/3 miles). This walk takes you to picturesque locations along the Merrimack River. Local historian Robert B. Perreault and Aurore Eaton, MHA Executive Director, will provide the historical background along the way. After the tour, enjoy lunch and conversation at the Millyard Museum.
item.name: "Mile of Mills" Walking Tour
